### Technical Tender Announcement: Buffing Lathes

#### Notice Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number        | **WS4552953111** |
| Publication Date           | June 27, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date        | August 8, 2024, at 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number           | 3 |
| Procurement Category       | Goods (GD) |
| Procurement Method         | Competitive - Open Bidding |


#### Description

This procurement is for the acquisition of buffing lathes. The solicited goods are classified under UNSPC 23242300 - Lathes and turning centers. The tender is a request for proposal (RFP) and competitive open bidding will be employed to select the winning supplier.

#### Delivery Information

The delivery location is British Columbia, Canada.

#### Contractor Information

* Contact Name: Anthony, Mitch
* Email: mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### Additional Information

The tender closing date is August 8, 2024, at 14:00:00. Bidders are required to access the tender notice through the following link: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20139799?extsite=MjAxMzk3OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>. For further information, please contact Mitch Anthony at the address provided above.  The Department of National Defence is the end-user of the goods implemented in this procurement. This tender is a closed, expired tender, and proposals have been submitted or tender documents have expired.
